<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Keep Pace](/Feats.aspx?ID=3427) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #175: Broken Tusk Moon](/Sources.aspx?ID=112) pg. 81</row>

**Archetype** [Game Hunter](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=169)

**Prerequisites**
[Game Hunter Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3425)

**Trigger**
Your prey is within reach and attempts to move away from you.

</column>

---

When your hunted prey tries to bolt, you follow. You Stride up to your Speed, following your hunted prey and keeping it in reach throughout its movement until it stops moving or you've moved your full Speed. You can use Keep Pace to [Burrow](/Actions.aspx?ID=93), [Climb](/Actions.aspx?ID=33), [Fly](/Actions.aspx?ID=94), or [Swim](/Actions.aspx?ID=39) instead of Stride if you have the appropriate movement type.
name: Keep Pace
